title: AttributeError: module 'matplotlib.axis' has no attribute '_make_getset_interval'
body:
Hi, I followed the install guide to install DLC-GPU on the linux cluster. When I imported deeplabcut the error came to me as below: 
In [1]: import deeplabcut                                                                                                                                     
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
 in 
----> 1 import deeplabcut

/apps/unit/WickensU/anaconda/3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/__init__.py in 
     28     else:
     29         mpl.use('Agg')
---> 30     from deeplabcut import generate_training_dataset
     31     from deeplabcut import refine_training_dataset

Thank you!
